core.name: Coma - Stargazing
core.description:
(Test V1)
At 600 meter, hold ATK to use Charged ATK
Activates Astral Harness mode. Summons [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal 12x50% ATK Fire DMG

When there is 1 [Holy Blade Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Starfire Retrieval] deal 4x80% and swings a [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal 12x50% ATK Fire DMG

When there are 2 [Holy Blade Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Blooming Starfire]. Swing the scyther to gather [Holy Blade Tornado], deal 4x50% + 1600% Fire DMG. Ends Astrall Harness and empties out the meter.

subskills.name: Coma Eta
subskills.description: (Test V1) During Astral Harness, Total DMG +30%, anti-interrupt increased and reduce dmg taken by 40% Total DMG

subskills.name: Coma Gamma
subskills.description: (Test V1) Restore 10sp when using Charged ATK Blooming Starfire

core.name: Eridanus - Flow of Time
core.description:
(Test V1)
In normal form, recover 50 star meter per second, max 600.
In Astral Harness mode, consumes 50 star meter per second until meter is 0 or until Harness ends off-field (kinda vague, but it does drain off-field).
In Astral Harness mode, Charged ATK summons [Holy Blade Tornado] in an area and [Brilliant Star Formation] forms around the circle. Max 2 tornado can exist at once. When SPA exits, Tornado and Star Formation disappears.

subskills.name: Durandal's Blessing
subskills.description: (Test V1) Enemies within [Brilliant Star Formation] receive 20% more Fire DMG from SPA (independent bonus)

subskills.name: Eridanus α
subskills.description: (Test V1) In normal form, when 4th Basic ATK hits, restore 80 meter

subskills.name: Eridanus β
subskills.description: (Test V1) Fire DMG +40%. SPA attacks against ignited enemies gain Fire DMG +10%

core.name: Pisces - Sun and Moon
core.description:
(Test V1)
100 sp, 20s cd
SPA instantly gets full meter and enter Astral Harness, gathering mimic durandal blade to form [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal a total of 1500% + 12x100% ATK Fire DMG. Pauses timer.
After ult ends, summons two [Holy Blade Tornado] that circles SPA.

subskills.name: Pisces Eta
subskills.description: (Test V1) When Astral Harness fifth Basic ATK hits, [Brilliant Star Formation] oscillates, deal 200% ATK Fire DMG to enemies in the range. Self Fire DMG +20% for 8s. Can be refreshed.

subskills.name: Pisces Gamma
subskills.description: (Test V1) Enemies hit by [Holy Blade Tornado] are ignited. Every 0.5s, inflict 30% ATK Fire DMG, lasts for 8s

subskills.name: Andromeda β

ATK Sequence all fire damage, recover star meter

Meter recovery: 10 > 5+15 > 10+15 > 3x5+20

Starfire = 50% ATK Fire DMG
